description: portrait of a man with PR arm upraised and fingers spread; man wears pink and yellow armor and green patterned garment; purple ground
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
text: Related to the play Ehon Taikōki絵本太功記, performed at the Ichimura Theater in the 8th month of 1865.
title: Actor Ichimura Kakitsu IV as Takechi Jūjirō
